name: Lyra
info: This highly curious, active young Trainer cherishes the bonds she has with her Pokémon. She is always doting on them.

moves.name: Energy Ball
moves.effect: Has a chance (10%) of lowering the target’s Sp. Def by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Dire Hit All
moves.effect: Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank.

moves.name: Sunny Side Up!
moves.effect: Raises the Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank. These stats are raised by 2 stat ranks instead when the weather is sunny.

moves.name: Light Screen
moves.effect: Applies the Special Damage Reduction effect to the allied field of play.

passives.name: Solar Shield
passives.description: The user is not affected by status conditions when the weather is sunny.

grid.bonus: Energy Ball:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Dire Hit All:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Dire Hit All:Critical Squad 1- Raises the critical-hit rate of all allied sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user’s move is successful.
Light Screen:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Light Screen:Move Gauge Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Light Screen:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Light Screen:Force Field 4- Has a chance (50%) of raising the Sp. Def of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user’s Pokémon uses a move.
Sunny Side Up!:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Sunny Side Up!:Hit and Heal 9- Applies the Gradual Healing effect to the user when its move is successful.
Speeding Sun 2- Quickly charges the move gauge when the weather is sunny.
Solar Flare 5- Powers up the user’s sync moves when the weather is sunny.
Healing Sun 1- Restores the user’s HP whenever its Pokémon takes an action while the weather is sunny.
Revenge Boost 3- Has a chance (40%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.
Charging Sun 5- Powers up the user’s moves when the weather is sunny.
Solarize- Makes the weather sunny after using the user’s sync move.
Soup Up 2- Has a chance (30%) of raising the user’s Sp. Atk by one stat rank when it is hit by an attack move.
Team Toughen Up 4- Has a chance (50%) of raising the Defense of all allied sync pairs by one stat rank when the user is hit by an attack move.

syncMove.name: Heart of Gold Leaf Storm
syncMove.description: The more the user’s stats are raised, the greater the power of this move.
